verbs.description: A president [V: can] pardon anyone — even himself — but that does n't stop impeachment . Even Trump 's lawyer Rudy Giuliani gets that .

A president can pardon anyone — even himself — but that [V: does] n't stop impeachment . Even Trump 's lawyer Rudy Giuliani gets that .
